original: intros m l n H1 H2. apply in_map_iff in H2. destruct H2 as [nm [Hin1 Heq]]. destruct nm as [n' m']. unfold tot_map_name_inv, tot_map_msg in Heq. simpl in Heq. injection Heq as Heq1 Heq2. rewrite <- Heq1, <- Heq2. apply in_map. apply H1. apply Hin1.
